${ModID}:MawFilletBlight.NAME: Maw Fillet
DESCRIPTION: At the start of the next #b%s combats, gain #b%s #yStrength.

${ModID}:SpireSpaghettiBlight.NAME: Spire Spaghetti
DESCRIPTION: During the next #b8 combats, the first time you end your turn without playing cards, #yExhaust your hand and start a new turn.
